body:
This will add shadow-uidmap, hoping to address #12297 @odoublewen I didn't hit the issue with semanage.h - does this mean I have it on my host (and still need to install here?)

I'm not sure that I did the configure and install steps correctly - please review! 

Signed-off-by: Vanessa Sochat <vsochat@stanford.edu>
title: new package: shadow
